verses.1: Jakob tawh Egypt ah a hong pai, amauʼ innkuan ciat tawh ahi Israelʼ tapateʼ minte:
verses.4: Dan le Naftali, Gad le Asher ahi hi.
verses.5: Jakobʼ suanlekhakte khempeuh mi sawm sagih hi a, Josef pen Egypt ah na om khinzo hi.
verses.6: Tua ciangin Josef le a sanggamte le tua khangmi khempeuh si uh hi.
verses.7: Ahih hangin Israelʼ suanlekhakte pungin nakpi takin khang uh hi. Amaute tampi pha-in nakpi takin khang uh ahih manin Egypt gamah dim uh hi.
verses.8: Tu-in Josef a thei lo kumpi thak khat Egypt gamah hong khang hi.
verses.9: Amah in a mipihte kiangah, “En un, Israel mite eite adingin tam lua-in thahat lua uh hi.
verses.10: Amaute hong tam kha ding uh ahih manin ngaihsut siamna tawh amaute hih ni. Eite tungah gal hong om leh amaute in i galte pawlin eite hong do-in hih gam panin tai khia kha ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.11: Tua ahih ciangin nasepna tawh amaute a gimsak dingin amaute tungah nasem ukte koih uh hi. Israel mite in Faro adingin vankoihna Pithom le Rameses khuapite lam uh hi.
verses.12: Ahih hangin amaute a kinenniam ciangin amaute tampi pha zaw-in kizelthang zaw uh hi. Egypt mite in Israel mite kihta uh hi.
verses.13: Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Israel mite a gim mahmah in na semsak uh a,
verses.14: buan le leiseek tawh nasepna le lo sungah nasep namkim khempeuh tawh amauʼ nuntakna haksasak uh hi. Israel miteʼ sepna khempeuh ah amaute in a gim mahmah in semsak uh hi.
verses.15: Tua ciangin Egypt kumpipa in Hebru mi nau a domsakte, khatʼ min Shifrah, a dang khatʼ min Puah a kicite kiangah,
verses.16: “Hebru numeite nau domin, nausuahna tutphah tungah a tut ciangun, tapa ahihleh a naungek na that ding uh a, ahi zongin tanu ahihleh na nungtasak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.17: Ahih hangin naudomte in Pasian zahtak uh hi. Egypt kumpipa in amaute a thupiak bangin gamta lo uh a, nau pasalte nungtasak uh hi.
verses.18: Tua ahih ciangin Egypt kumpipa in naudomte samin amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin hih bangin gamta a, nau pasalte nungtasak na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
verses.19: Naudomte in Faroʼ kiangah, “Hebru numeite le Egypt numeite a kibat lohna hang ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute thadim uh a, amauʼ kiangah naudomte a tun ma-in amaute na suak khin pahpah uh hi,” na ci uh hi.
verses.20: Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in naudomte limbawl hi. Mite khangin pawl cing semsem uh hi.
verses.21: Naudomte in Pasian zahtak uh ahih manin amah in amaute tungah suanlekhak a pia hi.
verses.22: Tua ciangin Faro in a mipihte khempeuh thu pia a, “Hebru mite sung panin tapa a suak khempeuh Nail gun sungah na khia ding uh a, ahi zongin tanu khempeuh na nungtasak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
